name: Ghost Gear (Taylor Ritenour)
description:
I hadn't messed around much with the physics engine in Godot, so I figured I would go wild with that.

The end result is a very bizarre and "cursed" world where sprites that should be used for the enemies make up the walls of the level and the character itself is a strange combination of a ghost and two gears that you need to swing in order to get enough momentum to get anywhere.

The background for both the title and the level is actually made out of a lava tile from the Kenney platformer pack.

Credits:

All Assets and Sound Effects: https://kenney.nl/assets

Music: Beatrice Dillion - 55  Download on Open Music Archive
